mil5.3.10:1.2_0: ‘mamaṁ vā, bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, dhammassa vā,
mil5.3.10:1.2_1: saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṁ,
mil5.3.10:1.2_2: na cetaso uppilāvitattaṁ karaṇīyan’ti puna ca tathāgato selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne ānandito sumano uppilāvito bhiyyo uttariṁ sakaguṇaṁ pakittesi—
mil5.3.10:3.2_1: dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṁ,
mil5.3.10:3.2_3: tena hi selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne ānandito sumano uppilāvito bhiyyo uttariṁ sakaguṇaṁ pakittesīti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.10:3.3_0: Yadi selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne ānandito sumano uppilāvito bhiyyo uttariṁ sakaguṇaṁ pakittesi, tena hi ‘mamaṁ vā, bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ,
mil5.3.10:3.3_1: dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṁ,
mil5.3.10:3.3_2: na cetaso uppilāvitattaṁ karaṇīyan’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.10:3.4_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.10:4.2_1: dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṁ,
mil5.3.10:4.3_0: Selassa ca brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne bhiyyo uttariṁ sakaguṇaṁ pakittitaṁ—
mil5.3.10:6.1_1: bhagavatā dhammassa sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvaṁ avitathaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ tathatthaṁ paridīpayamānena bhaṇitaṁ—
mil5.3.10:6.2_1: dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṁ,
mil5.3.10:6.3_0: Yaṁ pana bhagavatā selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne bhiyyo uttariṁ sakaguṇaṁ pakittitaṁ—
mil5.3.10:6.4_1: dhammarājā anuttaro’ti taṁ na lābhahetu, na yasahetu, na attahetu, na pakkhahetu, na antevāsikamyatāya,
mil5.3.10:6.4_2: atha kho anukampāya kāruññena hitavasena evaṁ imassa dhammābhisamayo bhavissati tiṇṇañca māṇavakasatānanti,
